texts.name: Agar
texts.biography: Many thought that the warlock Agar was a madman, and then a dead man. While the latter has been proven incorrect, there is still no unanimity in Enroth's scientific community on the former. Indeed, Agar's creations are undeniably viable and functional - but could a scientist in his right mind think of instilling such nasty inclinations and proclivities in a living being?

specialty.name: Sandworms
specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Sandworms or Olgoi-Khorkhois by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 5 levels (rounded up).
